verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory and honour are in His presence,
Strength and gladness are in this place;
Come and worship before the Lord
In the beauty of holiness.
Let the seas roar, let the fields rejoice,
Let the trees of the woods sing out,
Let the heavens be glad, let the earth rejoice,
Let the men of all nations shout:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The Lord reigns! The Lord reigns! The Lord reigns!
